content: 2weeks ago i stoped using social media , stoped going on ligne I was trying to force myself to be bord I couldn’t ! I always find something stupid to do , I COOK, I READ a book , I re-READ the same chapter again , I PICK UP a paragraph write it on a paper, I THROW the paper ….I get stressed … choose a movie to get inspired …I cry because of the movie (most of the movies i picked weren’t even sad !) I should try again …
